net.sourceforge.metrics.internal.persistence
Class ClearStorageCommand

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--net.sourceforge.metrics.internal.persistence.ClearStorageCommand
All Implemented Interfaces:
Command, java.io.Serializable
public class ClearStorageCommand
extends java.lang.Object
implements Command

Clears the entire cache. Can be used for example to force recalculation of all metrics on version change of the plugin or change of preference values.

Author:
Frank Sauer

execute

public java.io.Serializable execute(PrevalentSystem system)
                             throws java.lang.Exception
Description copied from interface: Command
Executes this command on the received system. See org.prevayler.demos for examples. The returned object has to be Serializable in preparation for future versions of Prevayler that will provide fault-tolerance through system replicas.
Specified by:
execute in interface Command
Following copied from interface: net.sourceforge.metrics.internal.prevayler.Command
Returns:
The object returned by the execution of this command. Most commands simply return null.
